title: Bug 4971 Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971 Strange 'copy package' is causing unexpected behavior. When trying to copy a package in the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' module, the package 'ui' is mistakenly included in the result. This bug is observed in jdt.ui version 3.
OB: When performing a 'copy package' operation in the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' module, the copied package 'xx' contains an additional package 'ui'.
EB: The 'copy package' operation should not include the 'ui' package in the copied result.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' module. 2. Select the package 'xxx' as the destination for the copy operation. 3. Perform the 'copy package' operation. 4. Verify that the copied package 'xx' contains only the expected packages, without including the 'ui' package.
